name: NEXIQ
description: NEXIQ is a full-stack website. In this project, I implemented user role management. A general user can purchase any product, manage her all orders and be able to pay for the order. An admin can upload a new product, manage all orders, see all users, create another admin.

name: Bike Pro
description: With this website, one user will be able to keep track of all the products in his warehouse. On this website, users can delete, update, and add their product information. All user facilities are protected by firebase authentication.

name: Home Flavor
description: This is a full-service catering based company website. In this site user can able order food items. Without sign in user cannot access to order any food items. I have made this website responsive by using Tailwind CSS.
